items.name: The Godfather
items.description: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.

items.name: The Shawshank Redemption
items.description: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

items.name: The Dark Knight
items.description: When the menace known as the Joker wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham, Batman must accept one of the greatest psychological and physical tests of his ability to fight injustice.

items.name: 12 Angry Men
items.description: A jury holds the fate of a young man's life in their hands as they deliberate whether to convict him of murder.

items.name: The Good, the Bad and the Ugly
items.description: A bounty hunting gunslinger, a Mexican bandit, and an English outlaw scheme to find buried gold amid the chaos of the Civil War.

items.name: Pulp Fiction
items.description: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster's wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

items.name: Forrest Gump
items.description: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson, the events of Vietnam, Watergate, and other historical events unfold through the perspective of an Alabama man with an IQ of 75.

items.name: Inception
items.description: A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a C.E.O.

items.name: The Matrix
items.description: A computer hacker discovers a dystopian world ruled by machines and joins a group of rebels to break free from their control.

items.name: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
items.description: A meek Hobbit from the Shire and eight companions set out on a journey to destroy the powerful One Ring and save Middle-earth from the Dark Lord Sauron.

items.name: Fight Club
items.description: An insomniac office worker and a devil-may-care soapmaker form an underground fight club that evolves into something much, much more.

items.name: Gladiator
items.description: A former Roman General sets out to exact vengeance against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family and sent him into slavery.

items.name: The Silence of the Lambs
items.description: A young F.B.I. cadet must receive the help of an incarcerated and manipulative cannibal killer to help catch another serial killer, a madman who skins his victims.
